name: Jeffery & Hamlet
description:
Description

Jeffery & Hamlet - Temple Explorers is a 2-player cooperative game.

Try to collect all 9 gems before the time runs out. Some gems are surrounded by mud, which the pig walks faster in, while others are in narrow places, where only the human can fit. While exploring the temple avoid the skeletons: one touch and it's game over.

Controls
  • Player one uses arrow keys
  • Player two uses WASD
